backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko canister actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report describing a map-link update affecting frontend/src/App.tsx with associated components and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including App.tsx, global styles, Tailwind config, and index.html.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the app root and loading main.tsx with proper meta tags.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React landing page with header, hero, reviews, store map, gallery, and footer UI elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity state using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles defining OKLCH color scheme, typography, and Tailwind base customizations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point mounting React with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme with OKLCH color tokens, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: JSON describing a static singleâ€‘page website project, including its schema version, architectural notes, existing features, and intended UI elements for the Kedia Car Accessories site.
